content.rendered:
Our
WHY

We are here to inspire people to do the things that inspire them so that, together, each of us can change our world for the better.

Our Just
Cause

We imagine a world in which the vast
majority of people wake up every single morning inspired, feel safe wherever they
are, and end the day fulfilled by the work
they do.

We believe the best way to build this world is
to commit to building it together.

Welcome to the Help Others Industry.

Our
  Values

Be willing to constantly grow and improve. Build something that will outlast every one of us. Focus on momentum towards the greater vision.

Simple language and simple ideas are easier to understand and easier to execute. Everything we say should make sense to a 10-year-old.

Share your ideas and how you feel. Encourage others to do the same. We share in each other’s successes and failures.

Find something positive in every situation and every person. Be optimistic. Look for humor and lightness, even in challenging situations.

Find opportunity in imperfection and embrace the unpredictable. Be willing to see something from a different angle and be open to doing things in new ways.

Adopt an infinite
mindset

Keep it
simple

Silver line it

Take an
unconventional
perspective

Work
together

Our commitment to diversity

What
  We Do

Simon started The Optimism Company as a way to share his work with as many people as possible. Today, it is a platform to teach skills and ideas that help advance our Just Cause around the world.

Here’s how we do it:

  • Digital Courses
  • The Optimism Library
  • Keynotes & Workshops
  • Books
  • Podcast

Our Optimists
